testcase.system-out: @password_displayed_clear.OF-806 Scenario: # src/test/resources/features/password_displayed_clear.feature:3 Given user is at login page # com.ztrain.web.steps.LoginSteps.userIsAtTheLoginPage() When user fill in the password field "a123456" # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.userFillInThePasswordField(java.lang.String) Element not visible after click And User clicks on the display password button to the right of the password field # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.userClicksOnTheDisplayPasswordButtonToTheRightOfThePasswordField() Then The password is displayed in clear # com.ztrain.web.steps.PasswordInClearSteps.thePasswordIsDisplayedInClear()
